reviews.review_text: color slighltly muted on graphics which isnt usually the case with Airwalks merchandise so it wont deter me from purchasing others

reviews.title: Mens short sleeve t shirt
reviews.review_text: I usually wear a size large, so I ordered a large in this shirt. It is a little longer than I like, so I would probably prefer a size medium. I am 6 ft tall for reference. It is a soft material and very comfortable. It does not have pockets. It has a small design on the front chest and a bigger design on the back.

reviews.title: Mens XL Airwalk graphic tshirt
reviews.review_text: For size reference I am 5 feet 7 inches tall and I weigh 220 lbs. I normally wear a size XL in men's clothes. This Airwalk T-shirt is a size XL and fits true to size. The front of the T-shirt has a skull with plants growing out of the top of it on the left chest area. The back has a skull with flowers and plants surrounding it.

reviews.title: It's a shirt
reviews.review_text: What is there to say about a T-shirt? It's true to fit, nice looking and washes like all other T-shirts out there. I don't know if the words mean anything or it's just a fashion statement. I don't think it matters

reviews.title: Soft but not pretty
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] It's a very soft shirt and fits true to size. I like the unique color. I dislike the print I don't understand the Skelton. I wouldn't buy this for anyone but it makes a good painting/yardwork tshirt

reviews.title: Size down, runs very big
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The first photo is showing the size comparison, these run very big. I like the loose fit of an XL in men's, however this fits like a 2 or 3XL. I understand this is the style of the shirt, however I don't like it, it fits like a dress. It's comfortable and made well, nice material and design. I would wear this if it were my size, I'll probably just sleep in it to be honest.
